reviewText: I have wanted to buy the lost episodes on DVD for years. However, I refuse to buy them because they have been so expensive. The "Classic 39" episodes (which are masterpieces) cost less than $30 - yet you would have to spend hundreds to get all the lost episodes! They are finally out of print and I hope that if and when they are ever reissued they will be more affordable. I would love to see them again.
There is absolutely no reason they can't put all these episodes on half the amount of discs and release a complete series boxed set. That's all I got to say about that.

These timeless classics are still funny after all these years.  I still laugh every time I watch them.  Now all that needs to be done is to restore the last of the lost episodes (if possible) still not released and put them on DVD.
